Cadenhead's Stop Buggin' Basic: Cadenhead Services Stop Buggin’ Basic is an affordable pest control plan that focuses on the exterior of the home since that is where most pests come from offering you year-round protection against common house infesting pests.  This plan includes an initial interior and exterior inspection and treatment.  Followed by 3 exterior treatments performed every four months for covered pests backed by our DontBugMe Guarantee with no charge service for covered pests between scheduled visits.
Cadenhead's Stop Buggin' Plus: Cadenhead Services Stop Buggin’ Plus is a comprehensive home pest control plan that targets common house-infesting pests PLUS termites. This service includes 4 scheduled services performed quarterly including Annual service to maintain the Sentricon System. Quarterly services are focused on the exterior of the home; however, your pest control technician will treat inside as needed. Plus, the Sentricon® Termite Colony Elimination System.
Cadenhead's Stop Buggin' Preferred: Cadenhead Services Stop Buggin’ Preferred is our most comprehensive & complete home pest control plan that targets common house-infesting pests PLUS termites, mosquitoes, and fire ants.  This service includes 6 scheduled services performed every other month.  Services are focused on the exterior of the home; however, your pest control technician will treat inside as needed. Plus, the Sentricon® Termite Colony Elimination System, Mosquito Traps, and Fire Ant Control in defined areas.

Services/Programs/Package Name: Initial Cost followed by monthly payments noted below.
Cadenhead's Stop Buggin' Basic: Initial Price $250.00 followed by monthly price noted below.
Cadenhead's Stop Buggin' Plus: Initial Price $450.00 followed by monthly price noted below.
